articles.title: The Takeaways from President Buhari's visit to France by Garba Shehu - Guardian
articles.description: The first official visit to Europe since the COVID-19 pandemic saw President Muhammadu Buhari going to Paris, France to participate in a summit convened by Emmanuel Macron, his counterpart in France, on the financing of African post-COVID economies.
articles.content: France’s President Emmanuel Macron (L) welcomes Nigeria’s President Muhammadu Buhari upon his arrival for a dinner at the Elysee Presidential Palace in Paris, on May 17, 2021, following an internatio… [+6396 chars]

articles.author: Nick Wright
articles.title: Mikel Arteta admits he and his Arsenal players must be critical of themselves after missing out on Europe - Sky Sports
articles.description: Mikel Arteta admitted he and his Arsenal players must be critical of themselves after they finished the season in eighth place and failed to qualify for Europe.
